author: schneiml
body:
Like #17209, but one more material updated after measurements.

- For FPIX, 290um instead of 300um sensor thickness (value measured at FNAL). This change will affect positions of the senstive volumes, even if it is just a few um.

- For BPIX (thanks @zucchett )
   - Correct material for Flange4. This significantly increases the mass of this volume, the old material was incorrect. 
   - Changs to densities to match measurements at PSI
   - Changes to the Sector D shield material.
   - Update to SupplyTubeConn3 to match Supply Tube weight measurements.

If we can get this into pre3, #17209 is obsolete; otherwise, we'll rebase this later.
title: Pixel Material Budget Changes (updated)
